TopicTitle: The demo won't open, will the real version?

Articles.Content:
Hi! 

I of course want to support the developers. But I tried to download the "lite" file, or what it's called. But when I open it it just keeps jumping in my dock, and never opens. I'm playing on a MacBook Air, and it has all the specs needed.

I stumbled over this link, and I just want to know if any of you have experience with buying it or other games from here, what can I expect from getting it from here.

https://www.kinguin.net/category/4265/kerbal-space-early-access-steam-key/?r=11604

 

Thank you a lot

Edited July 30, 2016 by Red Iron Crown

Hi Flamingo.

I can't say I've ever heard of that site before, personally I would stick with reputable sellers like Steam, GOG.com, or the KSP Store. They all have sales from time to time, a bit of patience and you can get it fairly cheap.

I also edited your post a bit to remove some references to a topic forbidden by Rule 2.2.
Sorry about the topics, didn't knew I couldn't write that. Thanks for the answer about the link. I'll buy it through the KSP store.
